favourite.article: My late parents would sing this song with absolute conviction and joy through many difficult situations they encountered. Now I sing it in much the same way, fully assured that God is for us and nought can be against us. Thank You Jesus.

God promises are sure and cannot be broken. The words of God are yea and amen. Believe it, confess it and live by it. It will surely work in your life and ministry in Jesus Name. Never doubt God but doubt your doubt. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you all. All blessings!!!
We are redeemed by the blood of Jesus, we cannot fear at all. He is our all in all. Amen. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you all. Shalom!!!
No matter what the enemies may do, God will always be with His people. If God be for us no man can be against us because the word of God is yes and Amen. Shallom.

Nobody can be against us in Jesus Name. Amen. Let us keep on trusting the Lord. He has promised Never to leave us nor Forsake us. With Christ in the boat, we will smile at the storm. Thank you for uploading this beautiful song. God bless you.
Nobody can be against us in Jesus Name, Amen. Let us keeping on trusting the Lord. He is faithful that has promised. Praise the Lord. Hallelujah.
Rejoicing in the Lord is life everlasting begun and health to our flesh.
It can never never be done that we be plucked from His hands. So comforting, assuring and encouraging.
It's so comforting to be reminded that God is for us.
Abide in the Lord! Amen! He is our all in all.
I love this song so much. Jesus is for us.
Romans 8:31 - What then shall we say to these things? If God is for us, who can be against us? Hallelujah for we are heirs inseparable from God's love and further more in God's mercy!
